title.narrative: 1.1. INTEGRATED, INCLUSIVE AND SHOCK RESPONSIVE SOCIAL PROTECTION

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Reducing Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: UNICEF further contributed to social protection system strengthening reforms for children advanced by MoLSA, including initiating the development of the first ever Labour and Social Protection Strategy for Armenia and sub-strategy on integrated social services, review of the vulnerability assessment system to address poverty, deprivation and impacts of shocks and revision of the Law on Social Assistance. UNICEF jointly with MoLSA convened partners, including IFIs, leveraging on resources and expertise to advance on these reform directions together. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:21/01/2022
